cells.data:
oc-cluster up _PROFILENAME_ --image="registry.access.redhat.com/openshift3/ose" --version=v3.4.1.10 --public-hostname 192.168.1.27
oc login -u system:admin
oc project default
oc adm policy add-cluster-role-to-user cluster-admin developer
oc adm policy add-cluster-role-to-user cluster-admin admin
